```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# This forces knitr to use the Project Root directory
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file())
```
# Install the updated package

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remove.packages("Zresidual")
devtools::document()
suppressWarnings(unloadNamespace("Zresidual"))
devtools::install(upgrade = "never", build = FALSE, args = c("--no-byte-compile", "--no-test-load"))



```

# Build the package site

## Build the whole Site
```{r}
devtools::document()
pkgdown::clean_site()
unlink("docs", recursive = TRUE)
# 3. Build fresh
pkgdown::build_site(
    lazy=FALSE,
    preview=TRUE,
    devel=TRUE, 
    install=TRUE)
```

## Re-build a particular vignette

```{r}
quarto::quarto_render("vignettes/intro_r_squared.qmd", quiet = FALSE)
```
